FuncDef:
The description command configures the description of a QoS profile.
The undo description command deletes the configured description of a QoS profile.
By default, no description is configured in a QoS profile.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of a QoS profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The description command is used to configure description in a QoS profile to facilitate marking and identifying a profile.
Configuration Impact
If you configure the description command for multiple times in the same QoS profile view, only the last description is displayed.
